itinerary.mapNote: Shira plateau moorland. Open volcanic landscape. 3840m.
Classic 'climb high sleep low'. Barranco Wall ahead. 3950m.
After Barranco Wall scramble. Alpine desert. 3995m.
Summit base camp. Early sleep before midnight departure. 4673m.
Uhuru Peak summit 5895m (4am), then descend 2000m to Mweka. 3068m.

waypoints.name: Uhuru Peak
waypoints.note: Roof of Africa. Highest free-standing mountain on Earth.

waypoints.name: Stella Point
waypoints.note: Crater rim arrival point. Final 45min push to Uhuru.

waypoints.name: Lava Tower
waypoints.note: Acclimatisation lunch stop. 'Climb high sleep low' turning point.

waypoints.name: Barranco Wall
waypoints.note: Dramatic 300m cliff scramble. 'Breakfast Wall'. Queues at dawn.

waypoints.name: Rebmann Glacier
waypoints.note: Remnant summit glacier. Rapidly retreating — see it while it lasts.

waypoints.name: Machame Gate
waypoints.note: Whiskey Route trailhead. Park registration. Rainforest entry.
